flavorText: "Respect the wilds? Certainly. Fear them? No."

foreignData.flavorText: „Respekt vor der Wildnis? Mit Sicherheit. Angst? Nein."

name: Resolute Rider
originalText:
{WB}{WB}: Resolute Rider gains lifelink until end of turn.
{WB}{WB}{WB}: Resolute Rider gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

rulings.text: Multiple instances of lifelink or indestructible on the same creature are redundant.

text:
